element-citation.article-title: Model-based multifactor dimensionality reduction to detect epistasis for quantitative traits in the presence of error-free and noisy data

citation-alternatives.mixed-citation: Mahachie John, J. M., Van Lishout, F. & Van Steen, K. Model-based multifactor dimensionality reduction to detect epistasis for quantitative traits in the presence of error-free and noisy data. Eur. J. Hum. Genet.19, 696–703 (2011).21407267
